certValid(string,address).details: Verifies if certificate is not voided, in case if being  active, it verifies if an expiration date was set, if so,  it verifies that the expiration date < current date

createCert(string,uint32,string,string,s.details: Throws if certId of `msg.sender` already exists

getCert(string,address).details: Verifies that the certificate status != NONE, also verifies if the same has an expiration date, in that case it verifies that the expiration date < current date

voidCert(string).details: Throws if `msg.sender` is the not current owner
